Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time spent in 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time taken for a case to move from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to any subsequent activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Average time difference between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' across cases where both activities occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time before 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' after 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time difference between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases that undergo both activities
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases leading to a rejection, aiming to identify bottlenecks in the pre-approval process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER for cases where activity Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Average time difference between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the next activity, to measure efficiency in processing approvals
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Total time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in cases involving budget owner approval, to assess the impact of budget owner's decision on the overall approval time
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' for cases that are eventually approved by any approver
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to 'Request Payment' in cases where the declaration is approved without rejections
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time it takes from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' to 'Payment Handled' in cases with direct approval flow
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in cases successfully completed without rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case
